mapper.select:
SELECT
A.HOME_CODE, A.MDATE, A.UC_PRODUCTTYPE, A.UC_MODELGROUP, A.UC_POWER, A.UC_FANMODE, A.UC_TOTALAIRCLEANLESS, A.UC_DUSTSTATUS, A.UI_DUSTPM2_5DATA, A.UC_GASSTATUS, A.UC_FILTERALARM, A.UC_HUMANBODYSENSOR, A.UI_HUMANBODYSENSORDATA, A.SC_TEMPSENSOR, A.UC_HUMIDITYSENSOR, A.UC_BPM_MOVINGPOWER, A.UI_BPM_DATA, A.RDATE
FROM TBL_AIRCLEANER A
